channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloud Foundry -- Routing Release
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloud Foundry -- Routing Release

item.title: CVE-2023-34061|2024-08-02T16:01:53.639Z -- cloud%20foundry -- routing%20release
item.description: Cloud Foundry routing release versions from v0.163.0 to v0.283.0 are vulnerable to a DOS attack. An unauthenticated attacker can use this vulnerability to force route pruning and therefore degrade the service availability of the Cloud Foundry deployment.

item.title: CVE-2024-22279|2024-06-11T17:23:34.311Z -- cloud%20foundry -- routing%20release
item.description: Improper handling of requests in Routing Release > v0.273.0 and <= v0.297.0 allows an unauthenticated attacker to degrade the service availability of the Cloud Foundry deployment if performed at scale.

item.title: CVE-2024-22279|2024-08-01T22:43:34.216Z -- cloud%20foundry -- routing%20release
item.description: Improper handling of requests in Routing Release > v0.273.0 and <= v0.297.0 allows an unauthenticated attacker to degrade the service availability of the Cloud Foundry deployment if performed at scale.
